name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: How to Calculate on Google Chrome Calculator

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A robust scientific calculator extension for Chrome. Perform basic to advanced mathematical operations directly from your browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: How to Calculate on Google Chrome Calculator offers a user-friendly interface for various mathematical tasks. From basic arithmetic operations to advanced functions like trigonometry, logarithms, and exponentiation, this extension equips users with the tools needed for both simple and complex calculations. Additionally, with a history feature, users can review their past calculations at a glance. With a sleek design that matches Chrome's aesthetics, this calculator not only functions efficiently but also looks great.
